English: Did you...come to save me again?
German: Bist du ... gekommen, um mich wieder zu retten?

English:
It's always the same with you...
You come and save me, treat me all gentle, and
then look down on me!
Chinese:
你每次都這樣……
都是這樣出手幫我──對我好，但也瞧不起我！
Korean:
너는 언제나 그래…
그렇게 나를 구하고―― 상냥하게 대하고, 깔보고!
German:
Immer das Gleiche mit dir ... Kommst mich retten,
bist nett zu mir und alles, und rümpfst dann
die Nase über mich!

English:
It's true...
He's the same as all the others.
Chinese:
沒錯……
這個人也和其他傢伙沒兩樣。
Korean:
그래……
이 녀석도 다른 녀석들과 같아
German:
Es stimmt ...
Er ist genau wie alle anderen.

English:
So I want you to take a good look.
Look at *me*.
Chinese:
那就好好瞧一瞧吧，
見識一下“我”的真面目啊……
German:
Schau also mal gut hin.
Schau *mich* an.

English:
Come. The stage is all prepared.
This time we'll finish it.
Chinese:
過來吧，舞臺已經準備好了，
這次真的要來做個了結。
Korean:
와라. 무대를 준비했다.
이번에야말로 결판을 내자
German:
Komm. Die Bühne ist bereit.
Dieses Mal bringen wir es zu Ende.

Chinese: 這是要我們追上去……的意思吧？
